discipline.name: Presence
discipline.overview: The Kindred ability to dominate a social scene as flawlessly as their hunting ground is embodied by Presence. Skilled Kindred cause others to feel irresistible allure or unfettered dread within mere moments. Presence is a potent emotional manipulation to score easy victims, coerce devotion, and sail through social settings. While Dominate is a handy tool to bend others to one's will, it is not as subtle as presence. Presence isn't direct control, but influence leaves victims with their ability to think; making those affected more useful for manipulation, but unpredictable. To use this discipline, the victim needs to be physically present or within earshot of the Kindred. Without Star Magnetism the power cannot transmit over electronics. While Presence is a subtle Discipline without overt uses or obvious clues, Auspex such as Sense the Unseen can detect its use at the moment, and Unswayable Mind can be used when contesting the supernatural influence. Presence powers do not stack and only Dread Gaze and Majesty can be used on violent enemies, as their minds can't be charmed when they have decided to hurt the Kindred.

level1.name: Awe
level1.effect: Add Presence rating to any Skill roll involving Persuasion, Performance, or Charisma related rolls as per ST discretion
level1.duration: One scene or until ended by the user
level1.notes: Once the power wears off the victim reverts to their original opinions

level1.name: Daunt
level1.effect: Add Presence rating to any intimidation rolls
level1.duration: One scene or until ended by the user
level1.notes: Awe and Daunt cannot be used at the same time

level1.name: Eyes of the Serpent
level1.effect: Immobilize a victim by making eye contact
level1.duration: Until eye contact is broken or the scene ends
level1.notes: A vampire victim can break this by spending Willpower any turn after the first

level2.name: Lingering Kiss
level2.effect: Usable during feedings, the victim gains a bonus to Social attribute for one night
level2.duration: Number of nights equal to the user's Presence rating
level2.notes: A withdrawal follows where the victim takes a penalty equal to the original bonus when not actively working towards the next fix. It cannot be used on those under a Blood Bond. Unbondable cannot take this discipline power

level2.name: Melpominee
level2.effect: Use Presence without seeing the target, only having them within earshot
level2.notes: This works with Awe, Daunt, Dread Gaze, Entrance, and Majesty
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 80

level3.name: Clear the Field
level3.effect: Clear a space in a calm and orderly manner
level3.notes: They can exempt a number of people equal to their Composure
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Fall of London, page 31

level3.name: Dread Gaze
level3.effect: Instill fear into a target to make them flee
level3.notes: A critical win against a vampire victim means the victim makes a terror Frenzy at difficulty 3

level3.name: Entrancement
level3.effect: Influence someone into a star-struck or beguiled state of mind where they do their best to keep the user happy. Adding their Presence rating in dice to any social rolls against the victim
level3.duration: One hour plus one per point of margin
level3.notes: If the request is harmful to the victim or their loved ones, or opposes their tenets the test must be made again or Entrancement fails

level3.name: Thrown Voice
level3.effect: Throw their voice from any point within sight and leave the voice there
level3.notes: A roll is only needed if being used in combination with Irresistible Voice, Melpominee or similar powers
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 80

level3.name: True Love's Face
level3.effect: The victim will perceive the user as a mortal they have strong emotional ties with, be it hatred or love
level3.notes: Can net stains for the victim if the perceived target is their touchstone
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Cults of the Blood Gods, page 85

level4.name: Irresistible Voice
level4.effect: The user's voice alone is enough to use Dominate on a target

level4.name: Magnum Opus
level4.notes: Audiences must roll Composure + Resolve to resist its effects

level4.name: Suffuse the Edifice
level4.notes: If the vampire is present they become the focus instead of the building
level4.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 80

level4.name: Summon
level4.effect: Call someone to them who has had certain Presence powers used on them or tasted the user's vitae
level4.notes: The victim will not physically or financially harm themselves to reach the user

level4.name: Wingman
level4.effect: Extend Presence onto another character to use
level4.cost: One Rouse Check plus additional powers
level4.notes: The same Presence power used by both does not double the bonus
level4.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Blood Stained Love, page 152

level5.name: Majesty
level5.effect: Everyone who looks at the user is dumbstruck unable to act in any way other than self-preservation
level5.notes: A win on the contested roll allows one turn plus one per margin of freedom

level5.name: Star Magnetism
level5.effect: Allows the use of presence through live-feed technology, does not work on recorded content
level5.notes: If using Entrancement the user must speak the targets name clearly

amalgams.name: Implant Suggestion
amalgams.effect: Change another's personality or opinion temporarily
amalgams.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 74

amalgams.name: Spark of Rage
amalgams.effect: Incite anger or frenzy onto onlookers
